mapper.select: SELECT u.youtubelink, u.nickname, u.pagename, p.image, p.contents as context FROM user u JOIN profile p ON u.number = p.user_number WHERE u.number = #{number}
mapper.update: UPDATE user u, profile p SET u.youtubelink = #{youtubelink}, u.nickname = #{nickname}, u.pagename = #{pagename}, p.image = #{image}, p.contents = #{context} WHERE u.number = #{number} AND u.number = p.user_number
